snippet: Periodically throughout the Olympics, The Times will check in with Dennis Spurr, a sausage maker in Weymouth, England, where the sailing events are taking place.
abstract: Periodically throughout the Olympics, The Times will check in with Dennis Spurr, a sausage maker in Weymouth, England, where the sailing events are taking place.

headline.main: Weymouth Journal: A Laugher in the Sausage-Making Event
